bibl.title: Notes on Some Comic Papyri.
bibl.note: (i) P. Paris Louvre Inv. E 7172 = P. Didot 2-15 [= Pack2 1319] = fr. com. adesp. 1001 Kassel-Austin. - (ii) P. Hamb. II, 120 [= Pack2 1643] = Men. fr. 951 Körte-Thierfelder = fr. com. adesp. 1089 Kassel-Austin. - (iii) P. Freib. Inv. 12 [P. Freib. I, 1 (b) recto = Pack2 1577] = Men. fr. 722 Körte-Thierfelder = fr. com. adesp. 1027 Kassel-Austin. - (iv) P. Oxy. XXXI, 2534.
ARNOTT W. Geoffrey, Notes on Some Comic Papyri.
